Quickstart
==========

.. code-block:: python

    from python_translator import Translator

    translator = Translator()
    result = translator.translate("Hello world!", "spanish", "english")

    print(result)

| Above is example code for python-translator, below is a step by step guide of what is going on that code.

1. Import the library.
2. Make an instance of the translator class.
3. Take the result of the translate method in the translate class. 
4. Print the result to the terminal.
